Description:
A FABULOUS INVESTMENT CURRENTLY TENANTED!
Located only a few minutes from all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat including supermarkets and schools, this flexible property is positioned in a quiet street with a bus stop just around the corner. A neat established garden at the front of the property includes a wide driveway to a double carport, which allows for plenty of off-street parking.
The main property is a solid brick, three-bedroom home. All bedrooms have built-in robes and the master enjoys a ceiling fan and neat ensuite. The main living space is directly off the front entry, and its L-shape ensures the room has plenty of natural light and allows for flexibility of use. The kitchen and dining room is accessible via the living room and the main hallway and also off the hall is a family bathroom, linen closet, separate toilet and a door to the side of the house.
Outdoors, the side of the main house includes an enclosed fernery and out the back is a large lawn area, a fantastic undercover alfresco space ideal for outdoor meals, and shedding.
Also on the allotment is a separate, fully self-contained unit. This great little flat offers a private entrance leading up a ramp to the front door. Indoors is an open plan lounge, kitchen and dining room with great storage. A single bedroom features a walk-in robe and the bathroom includes a large shower. The unit has access to the main garden, but also enjoys a private garden and water tank on the other side.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating in main house
Four-burner gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher
Access from both sides of the property into the rear garden
Spacious backyard
Single garage and work shed in backyard
Water tank x 2
Separate fully self-contained unit
With two practical properties on the one allotment, this is a fantastic investment opportunity, particularly given that currently the two homes service satisfied, quality tenants on a periodic lease with a return of $430 per week combined rent. Located in a quiet street yet still close to the highway and amenities of Kangaroo Flat, the property is also walking distance to medical practitioners and within easy access of bus stops.
Insights: 15 O'Dea Crescent, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
An Ideal Downsizer or Investment!
If you want to downsize but still like to Potter in the garden, then this unit will suit you. A very neat and comfortable unit comprising; open plan-lounge-kitchen, with split system air conditioner and gas wall heater, 2 bedrooms, both with built in robes. Bathroom has been completely renovated into a Wet Room, with vanity, toilet and the shower is easy access with shower curtain. This property has been updated, also offers large laundry with access by ramp at the rear to a compact lovely established garden, and small lawn area, garden shed, and room for veggie garden etc. Add also to the list single carport at the front, so direct entry. This property is on its own title so no body corporate fees! This property is ideal for the investor or someone who is looking to downsize and looking for a smaller home/unit to maintain. Close to Centro Plaza Shopping Centre.
Insights: 2/37 Short Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Living & Outstanding Potential on 1880m2
The benefits and potential on offer at this impressive property are a rare find.
To secure something of this calibre in such an enticing price range will ensure an abundant level of interest.
The residence has been tastefully renovated and the substantial allotment is perfectly positioned for further development (subject to council approval).
- Floorplan comprises 3 spacious bedrooms, new kitchen with breakfast bar, formal lounge, new bathroom and separate laundry.
- Stylishly finished with new window furnishings, new floor coverings and repainted with beautiful colour schemes.
The roof has also been upgraded in recent years.
- Further attributes include secure parking with garage plus large workshop with concrete floor and power.
Another storage/shed area situated at the rear of the garage can also be utilised.
There is abundant space for entertaining, extending or just enjoying the open area which will be great for kids and pets.
Situated conveniently close to train station, schools, shopping and recreational facilities.
An attractive property in so many ways.
Sure to attract the attention of a variety of buyers.

Description:
PRESTIGE PROPERTY WHERE QUALITY AND AFFORDABILITY MEET
For those that expect the very best you won't be disappointed as you enter this immaculately presented home. Featuring four bedrooms, office, generous main with full ensuite, walk-in robe and ceiling fan, all other bedrooms are spacious with built-in robes and ceiling fans. Large open plan kitchen that features a 900mm stove and hotplates, stainless steel dishwasher and Caesar stone bench tops, expansive bench and cupboard space that leads on to the family dining area which has panoramic views of the large and low maintenance landscaped back yard that also has a gardening shed and solar panels. Boasting two living areas for entertaining and dining. There is an automatic two car garage that leads into the house via side entry for security and privacy. The property also features ducted heating and evaporative cooling offering all year round comfort. Fully fenced in a quiet neighbourhood with divine gardens and a street appeal that would make you proud to call this your new address.

Description:
NEAT, SWEET HOME ON MELBOURNE SIDE OF CITY
Enjoy great access to the outdoors with this easy-care home close to bushland and positioned in a quiet court on the Melbourne side of Bendigo. Just 6km to the CBD, the property is also within walking distance to the train station, bus stops, dog park and the amenities of both Kangaroo Flat and Golden Square.
A low maintenance front garden offers plenty of off street parking, including a double carport with secure gates providing easy vehicle access to the rear yard. Steps to the front door open in to the home and to a light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The kitchen includes a walk-in pantry and the neutral color scheme will suit both buyers and, if purchased as an investment, renters.
Three good-sized bedrooms all feature built-in robes and the centrally positioned family bathroom and separate toilet is easily accessible from all rooms. A laundry with access to the rear yard completes the design.
A glass sliding door from the dining room opens out to an enclosed alfresco area. Blinds offering shade can be raised to let the light in, and the large rear yard is ready and waiting for a green-thumb to really make the space their own.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Gas wall furnace
Four-burner gas cooktop and oven with separate grill in kitchen
Access from both sides of the property into the rear garden
Spacious backyard
Good offstreet parking
Sitting in a fantastic position, close to the new indoor pool and leisure centre and minutes from shops and schools, this delightful home is also within easy reach of bushland tracks and trails. Secure and low maintenance, this property is ideal for an investor, or perfect for a buyer seeking easy living in a lovely pocket of Kangaroo Flat.
Insights: 2 Diamond Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal Medical/Professional Rooms (STCA)!
For approximately 50 years, this tightly held 1560 m2 approx parcel of land with a 31m frontage to High St, Kangaroo Flat is now waiting for its next chapter with its interconnecting double residences.
The main home has 3 bedrooms plus study, L shaped lounge-dining room, galley kitchen, 3 pce bathroom & separate toilet, walk in store room, utility/sewing room, gas heating & 2 split systems.
The self contained unit has 1 bedroom with open plan kitchen/dining/lounge, 3 pce bathroom, separate laundry, private front & rear entrance access, gas heating & split system.
Left & right hand side access of the residence with a high profile, high traffic location on a main road, is ripe for future development. (STCA). Expected rental $370 to $385 per week. A visit will impress!

Description:
Quality home in a league of its own.
Video: https://youtu.be/fFR2PxbEF9s
This amazing dual-level domain caters to the needs of every member of the family. The art of living well has been mastered with approximately 38 squares of living incorporating a large and luxurious master wing, four bedrooms, three designer bathrooms, home office (5th bedroom), hobby/multipurpose room and exceptional living and entertaining areas.
The multi-textured exterior includes a welcoming portico and big tiled entry hall with access to the triple garage. An real eye-opener, the garage includes remote doors, walk-in storage room and attached workshop complete with Tufflift hydraulic hoist.
To the right of the entry is the parent's sanctuary with big bedroom, two walk-in robes, huge ensuite boasting stone-topped vanity with twin basins, walk-in double shower and separate WC. while an adjoining open-air area houses a relaxing Jacuzzi hot tub.
Entertainment is paramount throughout with a big pool room featuring built-in cabinetry and drink fridges, a home theatre equipped with 3 metre screen, projector and sound system and covered alfresco area accessed from the pool room and dining area overlooking a sparkling 8 metre pool.
The heart of the home is the spacious open-plan kitchen, dining and living area with ample room for a crowd when the occasion calls.
Primed for cooking and entertaining, the kitchen places no restrictions on culinary creativity with a big stone-topped island bench, a full suite of Miele appliances, soft-touch electric-opening and closing drawers and overhead cupboards, even a retractable television screen.
Beyond the kitchen is a home office (or 5th bedroom) with built-in desk and robes, a hobby/craft room (BIR), guest bedroom (BIR), bathroom, walk-in-linen storage and laundry.
The upper level is dedicated to younger family members with two bedrooms, sleek bathroom and large living/rumpus/gym area.
Maintenance-free surrounds means more time for enjoying the good life while State Forest opposite is perfect for a quiet weekend ramble or bike riding for the kids.
The owners thought of everything a family could ever need when planning this home it's in a league of its own!
Insights: 14 Needlewood Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: 198 Mackenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Affordable family home
This classic brick home is a real surprise package, and ready for some cosmetic updates to create a comfortable family home.
With 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms between the main house and studio, this home is ideal for investors or dual-occupancy combinations.
The residence contains a large kitchen-meals area with gas cooktop and wall oven, benchtop and cupboards aplenty, plus space for a wide fridge and sideboard.
The lounge with wood heater is in a separate adjoining room, and a split-system keeps both zones conveniently climate controlled.
The main bedroom has an ensuite as well as a walk-in robe.
Beyond the back door, a wide lengthy patio is ready for barbies, and the fantastic 2 bedroom studio with open plan living offers excellent accommodation standards. Furthermore, the fully-fenced 833m2 block encompasses garden sheds, shade trees, carport and extra off-street parking.
Being only about 150 metres from a bushland reserve and vast park with playground, is an instant attraction.
So too is the 5 minute bike ride to schools and college, less to sports and leisure centres.
It's just a 12 minute stroll to medical services, or you can catch a bus from just a few doors away.
An excellent choice for a wide range of buyers!
Insights: 198 Mackenzie Street West, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: 16 St George Park Drive Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
A beautiful family home packed with features
From an attractive street presence to the beautiful yet functional modern floor plan, to the back yard and alfresco, this home is absolutely perfect for family living.
Behind a garden of established shrubs emerges this beautiful three bedroom home that not only boasts two living areas and a study, but also delivers on several other features that are sure to impress, including:
- Beautiful timber look vinyl floors and plush carpet with natural tones throughout.
- The main bedroom has walk-in robes for him and her that lead to the ensuite comprised of oversize shower, vanity and toilet. Bedrooms two and three both have built-in robes.
- At the hub of the home is the kitchen perfectly equipped with a huge bench, plenty of drawers and cupboards, a pantry, dishwasher, electric oven and gas cook top.
- Sharing the open space with the kitchen is the family room, with plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy and views of the undercover entertaining area and the backyard.
- The main bathroom is conveniently located close to bedrooms two and three and the main living areas of the home. It comes complete with bath, shower, vanity and around the corner is a separate toilet.
- A study nook is an added bonus that will be well used when the kids have homework etc.
- The second living area is spacious and comfortable, ideal for those in the family who want to watch a different TV show or just to get away from the rest of them.
- Heating and cooling are well and truly taken care of. Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout and for those extra hot days, a split system in the family room will keep you cool.
- The fully fenced backyard is safe for both kids and pets. A garden shed in the back corner houses the garden equipment to tend to the fully landscaped allotment of approx. 601m2
- An impressive undercover alfresco area will easily accommodate family and friends on the warmer days when you feel like entertaining and could very well be the place to relax at the end of the day with your chosen beverage.
- A double garage with remote access also has a manual roller at the rear to allow for vehicle access to the backyard.
- The quality built, steel frame home is approximately 11 years old but has been maintained extremely well and has had a few upgrades here and there, making it better than new!
Within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat CBD, less than a 10-minute drive to central Bendigo and about 5 minutes from Lansell Square Shopping Centre. Schools, child care and medical facilities are also close by as is public transport. The ideal location for the family.
Insights: 16 St George Park Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Cosmopolitan Apartment Living
This sophisticated two-bedroom apartment offers modern living close to the vibrant Bendigo CBD. This impressive two-story residence is complemented by generous dimensions and outstanding amenities.
Downstairs is the sleek open plan kitchen, meals and lounge room. The kitchen is appointed with stylish black oven, gas cooktop and hidden dishwasher. Adjoining the kitchen is the downstairs alfresco in the courtyard, ideal for outdoor entertaining.
Upstairs is the accommodation, comprising of two spacious bedrooms, master with a walk-in robe and second bedroom complete with a built-in robe. The main bedroom has a huge ensuite complete with dual shower heads and floor-ceiling tiles. In addition to this the second bedroom also has its own bathroom.
Separating these two bedrooms is a boutique enclosed balcony. This second alfresco is a fantastic added feature which gives the upstairs a lovely space to enjoy your morning coffee or to entertain in the winter as its fully enclosed.
Additional features include an additional powder room, a full-sized laundry, evaporative cooling and ducted heating, one lock-up garage plus another off street car space.
This awesome contemporary apartment is situated just 5 minutes from the CBD plus Woolworths is just down the road so you'll never have to travel far for all your everyday needs.
Investors will snap this one up quickly so get in contact fast and book your private inspection.
Insights: 3A High Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 20 other 2 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Well maintained home with impressive alfresco
An impressive, well maintained home that will tick all the boxes. Perfect for retirees or first home buyers and professionals.
Tucked away on the high side of a quiet cul-de-sac is this three bedroom brick veneer home with a list of features you are sure to be impressed by, including;
An open plan living/dining /kitchen area. The well-equipped kitchen is comprised of electric wall oven, gas cooktop, dishwasher, double sink, plenty of bench space and cupboards as well as a pantry. The meals and family area has sliding door access to the amazing alfresco.
Three spacious bedrooms, main with walk-in robe and the remaining bedrooms with built-in robes, plenty of storage.
The main bathroom with shower, bath and vanity can be accessed from the main bedroom too, effectively making it as convenient as an ensuite.
An impressive undercover alfresco area comes complete with translucent café blinds making this an extra living space that can be occupied year-round.
Ducted heating and cooling to keep the climate perfect.
A double lock up garage with a manual roller door for vehicle access to the side verandah, allowing for undercover storage for a boat, motorbike, motor scooter, pop-up caravan or trailer.
Low maintenance landscaping both front and back of stone and artificial turf as well as a few shrubs and rose bushes.
Within walking distance to all amenities including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks, entertainment and conveniently located within close proximity of Lansell Square Shopping Centre. What more do you need?
Estimated rental $320 - $330 per week.

Set on an elevated 655m2 block is this immaculately maintained 3-bedroom home situated in a quiet area of Kangaroo Flat. Property features include:

Description:
FANTASTIC FAMILY HOME WITH FOREST VIEWS
Located in a popular, quality estate on the Melbourne side of Bendigo, this beautifully presented home is close to shopping centre, schools, medical facilities and more. A low maintenance, neat and tidy front garden provides plenty of curb appeal and belies the space and grandeur to be found indoors.
A wide entry hall provides glimpse of the stunning views at the rear of the property, with the large central open plan kitchen, living and dining room at the rear of this upper level making the most of the outlook. The contemporary kitchen enjoys every convenience including essastone benchtops and a sizeable butlers pantry. Triple aspect windows flood the space with light, and glass sliding doors from both the dining and living areas open out to a wide alfresco balcony providing sweeping vistas across the city and to the forest beyond. A second, formal lounge room, can be found at the front of the house and a full powder room with separate toilet down the hall is perfect for guests. Carpeted stairs from the central living space lead down to the third living room the perfect zone for kids with a sliding door opening out to the backyard.
The master suite is located off the main entry and this large, light filled room includes a walk-through robe and a spacious ensuite and separate toilet. Across the hall is the first of three further bedrooms ideal for a nursery or a home office. The remaining two bedrooms can be found downstairs off the kids living area. This section of the house also enjoys a large family bathroom with spa bath, light-filled laundry and excellent additional storage.
Outdoors, a grass area on the lower level provides a low maintenance space to enjoy in the rear garden. Extra height retaining walls deliver privacy and a neat and sunny courtyard offers extra entertaining space. Under the house, with secure access to the inside of the property, is a powered workspace and storage area. A driveway down the side of the house allows access from the front of the home to the rear yard.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating upstairs
Split system heating and cooling downstairs
Solar panels
Rainwater tank plumbed into house
Ducted vacuum system
Zoned speaker system indoors and outdoors
Modern kitchen appliances including double wall oven, five-burner gas cooktop and dishwasher
Excellent storage
Secure internal access to double garage and downstairs workshop
Automated sprinkler system
With a clever design that makes the most of the allotment whilst still providing an ideal family-friendly set up, this practical and beautiful home has it all. Excellent storage, considered features and space for everyone, this fantastic property is excellent for a variety of family situations allowing room for each and every member.

Description:
Position meets Outstanding Potential
Superbly located three bedroom investment property zoned Commercial (C2Z). Utilise the 674sqm block to operate a business, extend, option to renovate or build new (STCA).
* Lounge features original brick fireplace, ceiling fan and a reverse cycle split system.
* Modernised kitchen with gas upright stove, pantry and great bench area.
* Updated family bathroom provides shower and separate bath.
* Spacious rear garden includes a divisional fence - beyond lies a single garage and small garden shed all on title.
Stroll to Kangaroo Flat's shopping precinct, station, bus, schools and walking track.
Excellent long term tenant. Rental $265pw. Periodic Lease.

Description:
Ideal Investment
Centrally located to all Kangaroo Flat and Golden Square amenities as well as Primary and Secondary schools is this well appointed townhouse currently returning $280 per week.
Comprising of a fantastic open plan kitchen, meals area and lounge room downstairs along with a powder room and European laundry. The kitchen offers a gas cook top, electric wall oven, ample cupboard space and a dishwasher.
Upstairs you will find the 2 carpeted bedrooms, the main offers a large walk in robe through to the ensuite with double shower, which also offers adequate space. The remaining bedroom is conveniently located closely to the main bathroom and includes a built in robe for storage. Both bedrooms have direct access to the undercover and enclosed outdoor balcony. The property also features ducted heating and cooling throughout, a single garage and low maintenance enclosed courtyard to complete the package.
For information on this terrific property please contact the agent today!
